keyword: calories in vanilla sweet cream cold brew
title: Calories in Vanilla Sweet Cream Cold Brew
meta_description: Discover calories in vanilla sweet cream cold brew, including macros like carbs, fat, protein, and tweaks for customization in a standard 16 oz serving.
h1: Calories in Vanilla Sweet Cream Cold Brew
assumptions: Standard 16 fl oz (grande) serving from Starbucks; includes cold brew coffee, vanilla syrup, sweet cream (milk and cream), no modifications.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, size, recipe, and customizations like extra syrup or alternative milks. Check labels or apps for exact values.

quick_answer.text: A standard 16 oz vanilla sweet cream cold brew contains about 190 kcal, mostly from cream and syrup.

label_note: Values mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with packaged or restaurant data.

tweaks.label: Use nonfat milk instead of sweet cream

faqs.q: How many calories in a grande vanilla sweet cream cold brew?
faqs.a: Approximately 190 kcal for a 16 oz serving.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in vanilla sweet cream cold brew?
faqs.a: About 24 g carbs, primarily from added sugars (22 g).

faqs.q: Is vanilla sweet cream cold brew high in fat?
faqs.a: Yes, around 10 g total fat, including 6 g saturated from the cream.

faqs.q: How much protein in vanilla sweet cream cold brew?
faqs.a: Only 2 g protein per serving, mainly from the milk.

faqs.q: Can I reduce calories in vanilla sweet cream cold brew?
faqs.a: Opt for lighter milk, less syrup, or sugar-free options to cut 80â€“100 kcal.
